snippet.title: Golden Treasure: The Great Green - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
The second trailer for Dreaming Door Studios' upcoming game about life as a dragon on ancient Earth. Hunt your prey, sing with the spirits, befriend Death, and become Great among the Draak-Kin, the True Children of Above and Below. Demo and full game out now (see below):

Play Golden Treasure:
• Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1065100/
• itch.io: https://dreaming-door.itch.io/gt1

Follow us:
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoldenTreasureGame
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/Dreaming_Door
